AAT.caption: Threshold
AAT.doc: At what point does the match algorithm give up. A threshold of 0.0 requires a perfect match (of both letters and location), a threshold of 1.0 would match anything.
AAT.name: threshold

AAU.caption: A threshold of 0.0 requires a perfect match (of both letters and location), a threshold of 1.0 would match anything.
AAU.name: threshold_info

ABN.caption: Tokenize
ABN.doc: When true, the algorithm will search individual words and the full string, computing the final score as a function of both. In this case, the threshold, distance, and location are inconsequential for individual tokens, and are thus ignored.
ABN.name: tokenize

ABP.caption: Match All Tokens
ABP.doc: When true, the result set will only include records that match all tokens. Will only work if tokenize is also true.
ABP.name: match_all_tokens

ABR.caption: Find All Matches
ABR.doc: When true, the matching function will continue to the end of a search pattern even if a perfect match has already been located in the string.
ABR.name: find_all_matches

ABS.caption: Location
ABS.doc: Determines approximately where in the text is the pattern expected to be found.
ABS.name: location

ABT.caption: Distance
ABT.doc: Determines how close the match must be to the fuzzy location (specified by location). An exact letter match which is distance characters away from the fuzzy location would score as a complete mismatch. A distance of 0 requires the match be at the exact location specified, a distance of 1000 would require a perfect match to be within 800 characters of the location to be found using a threshold of 0.8.
ABT.name: distance

ABU.caption: Match Pattern Length
ABU.doc: The maximum length of the pattern. The longer the pattern (i.e. the search query), the more intensive the search operation will be. Whenever the pattern exceeds the maxPatternLength, an error will be thrown. Don't set it too high, for performance purposes.
ABU.name: match_pattern_length

ABa.caption: OR Set Text to Match from an Input Box
ABa.doc: Check for fast updates from an Input Box value. Input Box should have ID Attribute set to "SearchInput". See documentation for more info.
ABa.name: search_type

ABb.caption: Check for fast updates from an Input Box value. Make sure you set the Input Box ID value below. See documentation for more info.
ABb.name: search_type_info

ABL.caption: Match Scores
ABL.doc: Match scores from 0 to 1, 0 is perfect match.
ABL.name: match_scores_array
